resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82342</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82342</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4270</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Advertising Jingles (2)</string>
            <string language="es">Publicidad de anuncios rimados y cantados (2)</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceoilín Fógraíochta (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bekanntmachende Jingles (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Refrains publicitaires (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jingles Anunciando (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jingles Di Pubblicità (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφήμιση των κουδουνισμάτων (2)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">After listening to recorded jingles from TV or radio, children are given a specific product to advertise and must compose their own jingles in groups.</string>
            <string language="es">Después de escuchar anuncios rimados y cantados grabados de la televisión o de la radio, se les da a los niños un producto específico para anunciarlo, deben componer sus propios anuncios rimados y cantados en grupos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tar éis dóibh éisteacht le ceoilíní a taifeadadh ón teilifís nó raidió tugtar táirge ar leith do na leanaí agus caithfidh siad a gceoilíní féin a chumadh i ngrúpaí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachdem man zu gespeicherten Jingles von 
Fernsehapparat oder vom Radio gehört hat, werden Kindern ein 
spezifisches Produkt gegeben, zum bekanntzumachen und ihre eigenen 
Jingles in den Gruppen bestehen müssen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Après avoir écouté les tintements enregistrés 
de la TV ou de la radio, des enfants sont donnés un produit 
spécifique à annoncer et doivent composer leurs propres tintements 
dans les groupes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Após escutar jingles gravados da tevê ou do 
rádio, as crianças são dadas um produto específico a anunciar e 
devem compôr seus próprios jingles nos grupos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dopo avere ascoltato i jingles registrati dalla TV
o dalla radio, i bambini sono dati un prodotto specifico da fare 
pubblicità a e devono comporre i loro propri jingles nei gruppi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετά από να ακούσουν τα καταγραμμένα κουδουνίσματα 
από την TV ή το ραδιόφωνο, στα παιδιά δίνεται ένα 
συγκεκριμένο προϊόν που διαφημίζει και πρέπει να συνθέσουν τα 
κουδουνίσματά τους κατά ομάδες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4270</entry>
          </identifier>

        </metaMetadata>

            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          </context>
          <language>en</language>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
